actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 106-384.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported H.R. 1231, in lieu of this measure.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain National Forest land to Elko County, Nevada, for continued use as a cemetery.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey a parcel of National Forest lands known as Jarbidge Cemetery to Elko County, Nevada, for use as a cemetery.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain National Forest land to Elko County, Nevada, for continued use as a cemetery.
